Job Details

New ideas are all around us, but only a few will change the world. That’s our focus at JPL. We ask the biggest questions, then search the universe for answers—literally. We build upon ideas that have guided generations, then share our discoveries to inspire generations to come. Your mission—your opportunity—is to seek out the answers that bring us one step closer. If you’re driven to discover, create, and inspire something that lasts a lifetime and beyond, you’re ready for JPL.

Located in Pasadena, California, JPL has a campus-like environment situated on 177 acres in the foothills of the San Gabriel Mountains and offers a work environment unlike any other: we inspire passion, foster innovation, build collaboration, and reward excellence.

As an intern you will have the opportunity to gain hands-on work experience as a member of the Business Administration Group reporting to the Business Manager and assist with all administrative activities, including support to Section Management and Business team. 

  • With supervision, assists in the provision of information, maintenance of databases and section wiki pages, report production and periodic financial analysis extracting information from different sources to compile data, data migration, development of local databases.
  • Executes existing queries for established reports.
  • Submits and tracks service order requests, assist in property inventory control systems; assist in coordination of facilities (office moves, technical labs and storage) improvements.
  • Reviews tasks for completeness, accuracy and soundness. Completes work assignments by following procedures and policies, and using data and resources; collaborating with others to address business problems; adhering to established priorities, deadlines, and expectations; communicating progress and information; occasionally identifying and recommending ways to address improvement opportunities; and escalating issues or risks as appropriate.
  • Interacts primarily with immediate supervisor and business team members within own organization.

Qualifications

  • Must be currently enrolled at least half-time at an accredited college or university pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Business, Finance or related discipline.
  • Must live within 50 miles of JPL.
  • Must be able to work a minimum of 20 hours per week
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills and ability to work in a team environment.
  • Must have a minimum GPA 3.0/4.0
  • Completed coursework with exposure to standard principles, theories, concepts and techniques in business communications, accounting/finance and database spreadsheets.
  • Ability to rapidly comprehend and apply financial analysis principles in high-volume environment.
  • Intermediate to advanced knowledge in Microsoft Suite: Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Outlook.
  • Excellent written and oral communication skills.
  • Punctual, details oriented, resourceful and a self-motivated individual.

The typical hourly rate for this job in Pasadena, California depending on education level is $16.11 as a freshman, $19 as a sophomore, $22 as a junior, $25 as a senior

JPL has a catalog of benefits and perks that span from the traditional to the unique. This includes a variety of health, dental, vision, wellbeing, and retirement plans, paid time off, learning, rideshare, childcare, flexible schedule, parental leave and many more. Our focus is on work-life balance, and living healthy, fulfilling lives as we Dare Mighty Things Together. For benefits eligible positions, benefits are effective the first day of the month coincident with or immediately following the employee’s start date.

For further benefits information click Benefits and Perks

The hiring range displayed below is specifically for those who will work in or reside in the location listed. In extending an offer, Jet Propulsion Laboratory considers factors including, but not limited to, the candidate’s job related skills, experience, knowledge, and relevant education/training. Hiring range for this job may be adjusted based on primary work location outside of Pasadena, California. This adjusted range will be provided to candidates by the Recruiter when applicable.
